body: At 1st level, add the following spells to your wizard spell list at the listed spell level: 2nd—entangle, 3rd—tree shape, 4th—plant growth, 5th—command plants, 6th—tree stride, 7th—liveoak, 8th—transmute metal to wood, 9th—control plants.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Wizard/Elemental Wizard Schools/Wood/Wood Magic
name: Wood Magic
